attributes.action: Spend more money on maternity services, by prioritising NHS resources more effectively.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My wife and son nearly died due to medical negligence.  The cause was staff shortages, not the staff.  They were very professional and dedicated.

I understand that the NHS has resource constraints, but the spending needs to be prioritised and maternity services should be near the top of the list.

More money should be spent on staff numbers, including the training of mid-wives.
